issue.title: Holonomic configuration unable to control using keyboard

content.raw:
The issue is that the keydrive example was initially written as a simple demo.  The interface \(ROS topics\)  for the holonomic propulsion configuration is a bit different.  

I’ve added an explanation of the interface to our wiki: [#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/keydrive\_details](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/keydrive_details)

I’ve generalized our example launch file to allow for a command line argument for the 'X' configuration in this pull request: [#!/osrf/vrx/pull-requests/205/keydrive-update/diff](#!/osrf/vrx/pull-requests/205/keydrive-update/diff)

I hope that is helpful.
content.html:
The issue is that the keydrive example was initially written as a simple demo. The interface (ROS topics) for the holonomic propulsion configuration is a bit different.

I’ve added an explanation of the interface to our wiki: #!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/keydrive_details

I’ve generalized our example launch file to allow for a command line argument for the 'X' configuration in this pull request: #!/osrf/vrx/pull-requests/205/keydrive-update/diff

I hope that is helpful.
